name: Dailies
description:
A small game/experience about a spanking discipline. No goals, just meditation. 

Features:

  • Multiple different marks.
  • Bouncing.
  • Different clothing.
  • Different sounds.
  • "Score" - number of punishments and number of spanks given overall. 
  • Different stories(reasons) for a spanking.

"ESC" - to completely close the game.
